This is a tutorial question. You will taken through the different type of questions and how to answer them.

This is a rank question which allows you to rank or sort answers. You just tap and hold any answer and hold it until its borders turn dark. Then you drag up or down and drop it. Click "Save and Next" to move onto next question
This is a free text question. To type, simply tap in the box and keyboard will appear. You can also translate the questions into speech by clicking \"Speak\".
This is a yes/no question. Simply choose yes or no by tapping the circles until they are filled in.
This is a multiple choice question. You can select more than one option by simply tapping the boxes until a cross appears.
This is a single choice question. You can select one choice out of the choices listed. Choose a choice by tapping the circle until it is filled in.
his is a multiple choice question. You can select more than one option by simply tapping the boxes until a cross appears.
This is a range question. Hold down the circle and slide it left to right to choose the correct value. Let go once you have reached the value you need.
This is another range type question. Simply do the same thing and click \"Finish Questionnaire\" to finish this tutorial.
You have finished this questionnaire. This a simple tutorial questionnaire and you may practice it as many times as you need!
